features: Soft and Comfortable: Gel seat cushion is design for provide extremely soft support to disperses pressure and provide relief from sciatica and back pain, promoting a comfortable sitting experience during long drives or extended periods of sitting

Foldable and Portable: This car seat cushion has a foldable design, and at the same time, there are carrying handles designed on both sides of the gel cushion, which makes it very compact and easy to carry after folding. (Folded size: 7.5”×10.6”×1.9 in)
Non-slip Surface: The non-slip surface of the cushion ensures that it stays securely in place, preventing any unwanted movement or sliding, providing stability and support
Great Air Circulation: The gel seat cushion is engineered with advanced technology to provide excellent air circulation, keeping you cool and comfortable even during prolonged use
Removable for Easy Cleaning: The black cushion cover of the gel cushion has a zip design, which can be easily removed for easy cleaning, ensuring that it remains fresh and hygienic for long-term use

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: travel seat cushion Discover unparalleled comfort with our Gel Seat Cushion, expertly designed for a wide range of applications. Made of premium gel and special honeycomb structure, gel pad is breathable and soft. Our gel seat cushion for long sitting is specially designed for pressure and pain relief. Seat cushion offers quick pain relief when your sciatica is raging, tailbone is aching and butt is sweating.

Honeycomb Design Gel Pad Cooling gel offers temperature-regulating relief and supports you to get rid of pain without seat-inducing heat. Removable Zipper Fabric Cover Removable for easy cleaning Breathable & Durable skin-friendly, comfortable, breathable, and easy to clean Non-slip Design The non-slip design of the cover ensures that most chairs stay put as long as possible and fits any chair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Built for skinny rear ends
reviews.reviewText: Not the two tone like it shows here and it's built for skinny, narrow asses..

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Portable and comfortable
reviews.reviewText: I love how portable and comfortable the seat is. Sometimes we take it into the office to help with uncomfortable chairs, but usually I keep it at home and use it on one of our cheap IKEA chairs while I feed the baby. It’s quite nice! The waffle pattern disperses weight nicely.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This cushion is two separate pieces, held together by a zippered cover. One side of the cover fabric is non-slip material. The gel inserts have holes that are about 3/4" diameter, but you don't feel the holes when you're sitting on the cushion. The cushion halves fold together and the cover has handles for easy carrying. For a small cushion, it's floppy and feels weighty - I doubt I would pack it for a backpacking trip, but it might be useful for extra comfort in stadium seating or similar. The manufacture claims "effective pain relief" .... perhaps if you use it for sitting on a rock. As someone with chronic back pain, I don't think this cushion will "provide relief from sciatica and back pain" however - the height of each gel inserts is only 1". I think this cushion may take the edge off discomfort, but don't expect Ekornes Stressless relief!
